comments.comment: This era of the channel is quickly becoming my favorite
This dude is reaping every reward that he worked so hard for over the last 14 years. I feel like these videos are him letting us enjoy them too. Big vibes

Aww : ( that’s so sad about the kitty honestly but the fact they put flowers and fed and watered him is so sweet. Shows that they cared and I’m sure he appreciated the kindness you and everyone around showed him
it's so relaxing finally seeing Felix live the life him, Marzia, and the pups wanted! This truly is a new era and I'm all for it!
Pewds Japan vlogs feel like they’re an epilogue to his YouTube journey. Absolutely relaxing
Rest in Peace Cat... And respect to everyone who cared for him/her

When I started watching: a scared Swedish kid playing horror games. Now: a down to earth mega star who is living his dreams and still being one of the most genuine honest people on the web.   Progress= unparalleled.  Can't express enough how much I love this.
the cat  thank u for giving him a blanket, it warms my heart that one of the last gestures given in his life was a loving one️
look at this man just living my dream
These vlogs make me feel so comfy

edit Please don't carry out any electrical work if you are not competent, electricity kills. 

As an electrician, I have to say this for safety reasons, that flexible conduit is there for mechanical protection of the cables as well as to protect it from UV degradation, considering it's outside where someone might bump into it you should have just moved the conduit closer to the wall and not remove it.

You'll never understand how much joy you bring to your fans by just being happy. I'm in a rough spot in my life and I was just thinking about how unhappy I am but I have no choice but to keep trying. But seeing you be happy, living life, and taking us with you makes me smile and forget how tired I really am. Thank you
Watching Felix looking happy and taking us along the journey is wholesome.
It's so fun to watch your adventures in Japan! Welcome to rainy season! Maybe it remind you of UK! But don't worry, very hot summer will start soon!

The fact the dealership let you keep the car because they appreciate what you do is honestly all I need to know to understand why you love Japan. The Japanese are honestly the most lovely people I've met. This vlog series is a gem. Never be afraid to do something new with your channel because, that's what brings you the most growth.

The fact that the people who made the Toyota just GAVE him the car and here in the US every dealership is charging 20k over MSRP...
Super happy for you Pewds, I've been loving these videos and this "new era". (but I must admit I'm a bit jealous haha)
The editing style has a nostalgic theme to it I feel. One day you’ll back on this video a couple years later and remember the joy you felt first exploring an entirely new world.
I fucking love how relaxed and natural this feels.

HOLY COW,  Pewdiepie, you got the most reliable and rare car to find in the 90s SUV classics. That is a legit Toyota land cruiser, and it looks in a mint condition. I would double-check the records to see if the shop maintained any maintenance. I love how the colors on the exterior look very clean, and you got a great taste, dude. Honestly, these suckers can run forever since they are probably 20 years old; if you can keep up the maintenance, then they're great to drive for a daily routine. Plus, they're super convenient for off-roading as well! 

I'm sorry it's too much to read because I'm fangirling about your SUVs. After all, they're such great cars, and I want you to make great memories of driving them. Have fun in Japan!!
I used to be a fan, but after watching this masterpiece, now I'm a whole air-conditioner.....
this is the best pewdiepie era. he's not making content on anything and everything and hes focusing on himself and his happiness. he's just living his best life

Love the vibe of these vlogs. Watching you guys just chill out and explore stuff makes me incredibly happy :)

From screaming at barrels, to cruising around Tokyo at night, haha. Can’t wait to see what you guys are up to next ️
Can't wait for Felix and Marzia to drive through the streets of Japan during spring when the Sakura trees are fully blooming on the sidewalks.

Felix’s mom’s message was so cute and funny! Your momma must be proud to have a son like you! Someone who is living a calm and warm life with a lovely wife  So awesome seeing you live your dreams Pewds. Enjoy having not enough problems ️
I didn't know i needed japan vlog Pewds but i'm glad it is happening.

The vlogs felt familiar, and then i realized Marzia is definitely part of the vlog-making process  the red-lights, power lines, drive-by city skyline, retro filters and playful music… so happy to see you and Marzia sharing these happy beginnings in Japan together! Loving the vlogs!
Felix's Japan vlogs feel like they are epilogues of his youtube journey. So relaxing.
These vlogs just resonate differently than the other material; it's crazy how calm it makes me feel to see Felix in Japan. I really enjoy these vlogs. I appreciate you sharing.

"Martzia says we should cover cable with stones I think we should paint it."
"SO guys I found the stones"
This is how it goes

One thing I noticed and love is that Felix has people in his life who keep him grounded and although he is a millionaire, he behaves like a regular person because of the family and friends around him. For example the wire problem in this vlog, his mom kept him grounded by reminding him “you don’t have enough problems” basically saying it’s not that big of a deal and you’ll be fine. Pretty cool. I wish more people had a good family and friends support system.
It’s so weird hearing Felix say, “glad tourist aren’t here” in a good way. Must feel amazing to finally be there after so long
Mad respect to the lads for just giving him the car :D
He seems so much happier now, it seems like this is what he truly needed.
congrats on getting two cars and RIP the old stray cat, with food and water on its side and it was given flowers after it passed away proves that it was loved by people despite being a stray.

The content is on top level these days after you went to Japan. The quality of content is higher. You seem to be enjoying making these contents more. And these vlogs are so calming. Gives you a sense of ease in this world which is clearly going to shit day by day. I am so glad you settled in Japan. Been growing up watching your videos since 2011. This transition of content is turning out to be my fav since like your Amnesia days.

Sad to see the Boxy Kei Car go. But It evolved to a Boxy Truck.
Congrats to your New Baby
I've never seen Pewds so happy until they moved to Japan (except for his wedding of course). I won't even mind if he stops the reacting or reddt video. I love this Japan vlogs so much.
I love these vlogs, please keep them coming. Visiting/potentially moving to Japan when I'm finished with school is the dream and it's nice to have a reminder why.
RIP to the cat of Tokyo
Shout out that dealership! ️

Seeing the respect and love shown to the dying cat by the people in Tokyo - from the food and water to the flowers once he/she passed - is just so refreshing and heartwarming to see. Thank you Felix for doing the same.

You've been my favorite youtuber since forever, I can't even remember the amount of hours I've spent watching you play. Since then, I'm so happy for you and Mariza that you're living the dream out in Japan! Much love.

As someone who loves cats so much, it's very sad for me to see the cat passing away/in their weakest state. Thank you for giving the cat a blanket. Let's also not ignore the things other people did for the cat on its final moments. This vlog was kinda sad and wholesome at the same time.
I'm surprised at how much I'm loving these vlogs, hope you will enjoy posting them for as long as possible!

felix: "youre a freaky one" 
frog just chilling: "what was the reason"
I had forgotten how nice and relaxing it can be to just follow someone along for the day. Makes me kinda miss the time when vlogging was at its peak.

Seeing him so happy in these vlogs genuinely makes me happy too! He's not uploading just for the sake of uploading anymore and I can really tell its a breath of fresh air for him. Keep on the Japan vlogs!!
So relaxing vlog, you can definitely feel the good vibes…
These are the perfect videos to end the day with
Broooooo we need more of this shit, so good, the style is bussin, making the vibes hit hard, can't wait to see how your life progresses in Japan

I never enjoy vlogs in general but felix his vlogs hit different. Just the chill lofi kind of vibe to it is so amazing. I love the edits and just the fact he shows us his adventure in Japan with Marzia. It's truly a beautiful country I wish to visit once
Loving that Marzia is letting us have some more screen time with her after stepping back from being in videos. Sending love and appreciation <3
Pewds being humbled by the world around him on his trips around Japan is truly beautiful. These vlogs have been amazing; so entertaining and fascinating - thank you man, what an adventure thus far!

2:30
"Do you ever wanna jump"
"No, No"

That car is engineered to withstand the harshest conditions a car can drive in with no major repairs for 25 years. Most cars are engineered to last 10 under normal usage. You stumbled upon the best offroader man has ever built.

Thank you for showing that cat so much love and kindness in its last moments. You are such a light, Felix. I wish I could tell you how much you lift me up when anxiety is destroying me. Thank you for giving everyone kindness and happiness like you did for that sweet angel in the moments when they need it the most.

It’s amazing to see how happy Felix looks in these vlogs. Not saying he didn’t look happy in precious videos but he seems to be enjoying exploring and the process of getting everything set up for him and marzia. He’s loving life and the experience. I’m happy you guys have found ur place
Loving these Japan vlogs just daily fun stuff, feels fun yet chill

Editing: on point
Content: Interesting
Marzia: cute
Felix: goofy, as always and how we like him
Yes, him jumping on that Tokyo Tower glass made my heart go pittah pattah

With all the good and bad moments, these videos have become my favorite so far, of all Youtube and more. They're really chill, introspective, moody. I'm enjoying them so much and I'm really happy for Felix and Marzia and the doggies. Have the best life at Japan, Pewds!
0:35 why did this fit with the beat so well, I was grooving to this

i need to be honest here, i've stopped watching you for quite a few years now and just tuned in occasionally because i wasn't into gameplay anymore, but ever since you moved i have made sure to not miss a single one of these vlogs! i love the vibe of them, it always feels super refreshing and is so enjoyable to watch :) keep it up!

I can’t believe how nice ppl r in japan..That cat died and ppl left flowers instead of throwing the cat away. Where i live they would have been thrown away if they were alive bc ppl here don’t care. Good job Pewds for caring so much about everything around u <3



Thank you for 339 likes im glad others agree with me <3 enjoy ur day

As a guy who's from Japan, I have never felt this proud of where I come from. Keep up the great content Felix. 

Brofist
That poor kitten, it broke my heart, I wish that kitten soul is in a better place.

Felix genuinely is a person who deserves nothing but the best. After so much hard work and dedication for 12 years, we finally get to see him doing something he really, really wanted to do for a long time. The amounts of content he put out there and the positive impact he had on millions of people, its amazing... Truly. Incredible to see him this excited, it's been a long time since he's been like this, Ive been around since 2011. I enjoy every vlog from Japan he posts, it feels as if an old friend is telling me a story about achieving their biggest dream and sharing the adventure with me. Thank you for this, Pewds, you beautiful man <3 Love for you and Marzia!

6 days ago Felix: “we’re getting bicycles! We’re gonna bike everywhere”
8 hours ago Felix: “I accidentally got 2 cars in Japan”
XD
Marzia fits in so perfectly with the Japan fashion stuff

I am such a huge cat lover, and I am so happy to hear that people gave him food, towels and helped him stay comfortable in the last moments of his life. It is heartbreaking to hear about a cat dying but so glad that people put flowers on him and honoured him instead of considering him as just another stray. glad to see such kind people in this world.
im amazed at how the people treated the sick stray cat. giving her food and water and even putting flowers on her. heart warming
I just love these japan Vlog vibe so much️
i can’t get over the cat bless their soul rip kitty
Rest In Peace, kitty. Thank you Felix for covering it in the rain, you’re such a kind person 🫶
'you don't have enough problems, Felix' - actually laughed out loud at that one :D these vlogs are so wholesome and they give me hope that my life will be like that someday ️
Those Japan Vlogs are my new guilty pleasure to watch
Missed videos like this from you two! Glad to see you’re enjoying this new chapter of your lives! And appreciate you bringing us along for the ride

I have to say, your Japan vlogs are the highest quality vlogs I've seen, better yet- it's super refreshing content.
It actually makes your channel feel new again.

Lately, I haven’t been in the mood to watch anything on YouTube, or otherwise for some depressing reasons, except these vlogs. They’re very peaceful and I am just happy to see Marzia and Felix living their best life in Japan. Good on you guys!
these vids be giving me great vibes!!
7:06 aww i remember slippy
I love these new vlogs about his new life style in Japan. Hope his having a good time over there

Must have been really hard to feel powerless for the cat, but it really seemed it was his time to go.  Now he can rest in peace. It's nice to see that people worried about him and brought him food and flowers the next day. People are so wholesome for pets there in Japan, I see why you feel at home there. <3
Can we keep the vlogs going!? The chill music and wholesome activities are helping me find some sleep while I deal with Covid. Thanks for all you do Felix!
Felix’s mom telling him he doesn’t have enough problems because of a cable is one the most factual things she could’ve said
This guy is a national treasure that must be protected at all cost
This video gives me a good vibe. Loving it!

Elevator: “Refrain from talking” 
Also elevator: literally doesn’t shut up for a second
Rest In Peace lil kitty ️
I still can't wrap my mind around how the fans from the dealership got you a nice looking car, cheers to them
The cat section of the video was lowkey really sad, almost had me tearing up, but i love how everyone in the community did their bit to let the little guy go in the most peaceful way possible :'(
These vlogs are so refreshing. I can't explain why but they always put me in a good mood. Its also cool to see Japan because I have never been!

The aquarium at night made me emotional, lol. I loved that. 
It is nice to see everyone so happy 
Thank you very much for being so kind to the cat.

it’s just so amazing to have watched felix sense the beginning and to see him living his life so happy wit his lil family- it makes me so happy  you can tell he’s rly gone somewhere with his life mentally and physically and is just doing what makes him happy
So crazy to see you in places we all know and love!!  Welcome to Japan!

The soundtrack to this vlog stood out to me. It feels like a honeymoon, with the home you always wanted. It's surreal that you ever even made it. The one song almost sounds like a lullaby, like you can finally rest easy now that you're there.

ive been a fan of yours for well over 10 years now, and seeing these vlogs just makes my heart so warm given that you two are living the life and you two have become such amazing individuals. ive been going through some of the literal worst times of my life recently but these vlogs and your content is definitely making it easier to get through this hard time. brofist pewds, from a very long time fan.

God, the comment section makes me feel like this really is Pewds' final season and thinking about all the stages we have seen him going through on his youtube journey across all these years to finally get to this happy peaceful ending makes me want to burst in tears
